statements: SELECT * FROM event_schedule;
SELECT event_name, speaker_name FROM event_schedule WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, session_time FROM event_schedule WHERE speaker_id = 2;
SELECT speaker_id, speaker_name, event_name FROM event_schedule WHERE session_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM event_schedule WHERE speaker_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT event_name, session_time, speaker_name FROM event_schedule WHERE event_id = 1 ORDER BY session_time DESC;
SELECT event_name, speaker_name FROM event_schedule WHERE session_time > '2022-10-01' AND speaker_id = 3 ORDER BY event_name;
SELECT * FROM event_schedule WHERE speaker_name = 'John Doe' OR speaker_name = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY session_time ASC, event_id DESC;
SELECT event_name, speaker_name FROM event_schedule WHERE speaker_id IN (2, 4, 6) AND session_time BETWEEN '2022-10-01 10:00:00' AND '2022-10-01 12:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT speaker_id, COUNT(*) AS sessions_count FROM event_schedule GROUP BY speaker_id HAVING sessions_count > 2 ORDER BY sessions_count DESC, speaker_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC, start_time ASC, end_time DESC;
SELECT session_name, speaker_name, session_date FROM sessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_name, speaker_name, start_time, end_time FROM sessions WHERE speaker_id = 3;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM speakers WHERE speaker_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT session_name, session_date, start_time, end_time FROM sessions WHERE speaker_id = 7 AND session_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT session_id, session_name, session_date, start_time, end_time, speaker_id FROM sessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_name, session_date, speaker_name FROM sessions INNER JOIN speakers ON sessions.speaker_id = speakers.speaker_id WHERE speaker_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_bio, speaker_email FROM speakers WHERE LENGTH(speaker_bio) > 100;
SELECT session_name, speaker_name, start_time, end_time FROM sessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT speaker_name, session_name, session_date, start_time, end_time FROM speakers INNER JOIN sessions ON speakers.speaker_id = sessions.speaker_id ORDER BY session_date, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM events WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT session_title, session_time FROM sessions WHERE session_time >= '10:00:00';
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM speakers WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT speaker_id, speaker_name, session_title FROM speakers JOIN sessions ON speakers.session_id = sessions.session_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events;
SELECT session_title, session_time FROM sessions WHERE event_id = 5;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM speakers WHERE session_id = 3;
SELECT event_name, event_date, session_title, session_time FROM events JOIN sessions ON events.event_id = sessions.event_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date, speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM events JOIN sessions ON events.event_id = sessions.event_id JOIN speakers ON sessions.session_id = speakers.session_id;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT session_title, start_time, end_time FROM sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM speakers WHERE speaker_id = 2;

SELECT event_name, session_title, speaker_name FROM events JOIN sessions ON events.event_id = sessions.event_id JOIN session_speakers ON sessions.session_id = session_speakers.session_id JOIN speakers ON session_speakers.speaker_id = speakers.speaker_id ORDER BY event_name, session_title, speaker_name;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM events WHERE event_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT session_title, start_time, end_time FROM sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM speakers WHERE speaker_photo_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT session_title, speaker_name FROM sessions JOIN session_speakers ON sessions.session_id = session_speakers.session_id JOIN speakers ON session_speakers.speaker_id = speakers.speaker_id;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, event_id, session_time FROM sessions ORDER BY session_time DESC;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM speakers WHERE speaker_id = 2;
SELECT event_id, session_id FROM event_sessions WHERE session_id = 3;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM events JOIN event_sessions ON events.event_id = event_sessions.event_id
SELECT session_time, speaker_name FROM sessions JOIN session_speakers ON sessions.session_id = session_speakers.session_id JOIN speakers ON session_speakers.speaker_id = speakers.speaker_id
SELECT event_name, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM events JOIN event_sessions ON events.event_id = event_sessions.event_id GROUP BY event_name
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE session_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '18:00:00'
